settings.title: Settings
settings.logs_info: üí° Log files are located in the logs folder, containing detailed program operation information

installed.title: Installed DLC
installed.subtitle: Below is the list of DLCs installed in your game
installed.features:
Features:
‚Ä¢ Display all installed DLC files
‚Ä¢ Show file size and modification date
‚Ä¢ Support one-click backup of selected DLCs
‚Ä¢ Support one-click uninstall of selected DLCs
installed.confirm_uninstall_all:
Are you sure you want to uninstall {} DLC files?
Files will be moved to: {}
installed.confirm_uninstall_selected:
Are you sure you want to uninstall {} selected DLC files?
Files will be moved to {} folder
installed.no_files_moved_detail: No files were moved, the target location may already have the same files or the source files do not exist
installed.select_dlc_first: Please select DLC files to uninstall first

uninstalled.title: Uninstalled DLC
uninstalled.subtitle: Below is the list of DLCs that can be installed to your game
uninstalled.features:
Features:
‚Ä¢ Display all installable DLC files
‚Ä¢ Show file size and modification date
‚Ä¢ Support one-click installation of selected DLCs
‚Ä¢ Support one-click backup of game files
uninstalled.temp_dlcs_not_found: temp_dlcs folder not found, no DLCs available for installation
uninstalled.select_dlc_first: Please select DLC files to install first
uninstalled.confirm_install_selected:
Are you sure you want to install {} selected DLC files?
Files will be moved from {} back to the game installation path
uninstalled.confirm_install_all:
Are you sure you want to install all {} DLC files?
Files will be moved from {} back to the game installation path
uninstalled.no_files_moved_detail: No files were moved, the target location may already have the same files or the source files do not exist
